meanings.definition: In a way that excites or arouses interest or curiosity.
meanings.sent1: The magician performed his tricks titillatingly, keeping the audience on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent2: The suspenseful movie trailer titillatingly hinted at a shocking plot twist.
meanings.sent3: The detective titillatingly revealed a clue that left everyone guessing.
meanings.sent4: Her mysterious smile was titillatingly enigmatic, drawing people in with intrigue.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led them titillatingly closer to the hidden chest.
